title.narrative: Malaria Control Programme - Pregnant Women Voucher Scheme

description.narrative: This activity (Malaria Control Programme - Pregnant Women Voucher Scheme) is a component of Support for Malaria Control Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £22,746,586. This component benefits Tanzania, and works in the following sector(s): Malaria control. , with the following implementing partners: Baker Tilly, Crown Agents Limited, Ifakara Health Institute, KPMG LLP, PwC Tanzania. The start date is 12-05-2011 and the end date is 31-07-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
